stepsInfo.label: Collecting Ads
stepsInfo.description: Gather vehicle Ads from multiple sources
stepsInfo.content: Gather vehicle data from multiple sources, including websites and user inputs.

stepsInfo.label: Data Extraction
stepsInfo.description: Extract relevant information from the collected ads
stepsInfo.content: Process and clean the collected data to ensure accuracy and consistency.

stepsInfo.label: Data Cleaning
stepsInfo.description: Process, Clean and Transform the data into a structured format
stepsInfo.content: Transform the cleaned data into a structured format suitable for model training.

stepsInfo.label: Model Training
stepsInfo.content: Train the machine learning model using the transformed data to predict vehicle prices.

stepsInfo.label: Completed
stepsInfo.content: The model is ready and predictions can now be made for vehicle price estimation.
